text: RT @govph: INFOGRAPHIC • Schedule of LRT-1's Quirino station during the papal visit: http://t.co/GATcT8ADeB #PopeInPH http://t.co/fPJFSHkBC6
2014 will remain in the history as a successful year for our country.
The country's economy has evolved successfully. Our economy grew by 3 percent and the non-oil sector increased by 7 percent.
The non-oil sector will further ensure the economic development of Azerbaijan in the future.
Population's money revenues have inflated inflation more than threefold.
Azerbaijan remains attractive for foreign investors.
Manat's stable serves to improve people's well-being, and the purchasing power of the population increases.
At present, Azerbaijan has more than $ 50 billion in foreign exchange reserves.
Our key economic indicators in 2014 are one of the best indicators in the world.
Azerbaijan is the fastest growing country in the world in terms of economic growth over the last 11 years.
We are among the world's 40 most competitive economies.
Azerbaijan is very respected in the world and is known as a reliable partner.
Azerbaijan's role in regional issues, regional cooperation is indispensable.
No external force can speak with us ultimatum.
Armenia chose imitation tactics in the negotiation process.
If Nagorno-Karabakh conflict had not been the major patrons of Armenia in different capitals, it would have long been resolved fairly
Our army has shown to the enemy and to the enemies of the enemy that Azerbaijan can restore its territorial integrity at any time.
What does the Armenian soldier do in Aghdam and Fizuli? Why do mediators deal with this issue indifferently?
All social programs will be fully implemented in 2015.
We will provide ourselves with all major food products in the near future.
The construction of the Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railway is over. Experiments are already under way.
Azerbaijan has already become a regional center with both freight and passenger transportation in the air transport sector.
The transport infrastructure created and created in Azerbaijan will serve both our country and our neighbors.
Ships are being produced in the shipbuilding plant in Azerbaijan.
The foundation of the Southern Gas Corridor is a historic event. This project will accelerate our long-term development.
We are determined to host the European Games at the level of the Summer Olympic Games.
European Games standards to be set in Baku
The socio-political situation in our country, multiculturalism, religious-national tolerance, open to the world (cont) http://t.co/qIkBqDncpz
Azerbaijan demonstrates its own development model. This is a rare economic development, a model of political reform.
Freedom of speech, freedom of assembly, freedom of conscience, freedom of the press, (cont) http://t.co/sLGl1Gr
These freedoms are our lifestyle, state policy.

The fall in #inflation is good news for families. Our long term economic plan is on track and helping hardworking taxpayers.

Investment Plan no silver bullet but part of strategy with structural reforms, sound public finances #EUCO

Europe is not old, haggard or barren. Europe is young, dynamic and vital. Our continent remains the best place in the world to live.

Flexibility within the Rules of the Stability and Growth Pact: we are not changing or REPLACING Those Rules, presser today #EC #EMU
The Stability & Growth Pact is the Cornerstone of European Economic governance. The Rules, Those need to be well understood. #EC #EMU
Those Member States That the pursue prudent fiscal Policies can Benefit from greater Flexibility.
Flexibility can not be granted IF Reforms are not happening. If Reforms are not Implemented, Flexibility will have to be WITHDRAWN. #EMU
We will Require a greater fiscal Effort from Member States in good Economic times, while in Difficult times the Effort can be more moderate.

I am pleased today to honor a group of minds and talents in the global Islamic economy in banking, food, tourism, media and culture http://t.co/uXn90ssW4B
Islamic economy is an integrated system encompassing all aspects of life .. Our goal is to develop its practices and methods and make it a major axis in the global economy
I also enjoyed the honor of Haj Saeed bin Ahmed Lootah, founder of the first Islamic bank in the world from Dubai .. He made a head start .. The history of the Islamic economy will keep its place
Rendo omaggio a Giorgio #Napolitano. Presidente, garante di stabilità per l'Italia e vero statista europeo. Grazie
I pay tribute to Giorgio #Napolitano. President, anchor of stability for Italy & true European statesman. Thank you.
I was guided to honor some of best minds & talents in the field of global Islamic economics, working in banking, food, tourism, media & art
Islamic economics is an integrated system covering all aspects of life. We aim to develop its methods, make it a key part of global economy

Press conference on the fight against radicalization and terrorism http://t.co/b6TU2S3vog
"The @PSofficiel philosophy is security in freedom and solidarity."
"@PSofficiel takes its security responsibilities every day and we will continue to do so."
"We are ready to support, on a case-by-case basis, some measures of the govt, but we say: + efficiency and real financial means."
"I am Charlie, I am Jewish, I am Palestinian, I am a victim of Boko Haram, I am a victim of all acts of violence and hatred"
"The PS will be vigilant for the gvt to keep its promises of financing the police, the army, the supervision in prison, information"
"The prison can not be the school of terrorism: isolate certain prisoners, strengthen their supervision and staff training"
"The fight against anti-Semitism must be a national cause"
"The PS demands heightened vigilance on places that are potential targets, such as newsrooms or places of worship"
"We must implement a real active watch on the net to detect sites advocating violent radicalism"
"It is at the local level that prevention actions against radicalism are the most effective"
"I welcome @rudivervoort's initiative to bring together the mayors and heads of the police zones of the Brussels municipalities concerned"
"The PS has always had the security of the citizens at heart: @LOnkelinx created the OCAM and increased by 70% the means of State Security"
